mapper.insert: INSERT INTO incoming_phone_numbers (sid, date_created, date_updated, friendly_name, account_sid, api_version, voice_url, voice_method, voice_fallback_url, voice_fallback_method, status_callback, status_callback_method, voice_caller_id_lookup, sms_url, sms_method, sms_fallback_url, sms_fallback_method, url) VALUES(#{sid}, #{date_created}, #{date_updated}, #{friendly_name}, #{account_sid}, #{api_version}, #{voice_url}, #{voice_method}, #{voice_fallback_url}, #{voice_fallback_method}, #{status_callback}, #{status_callback_method}, #{voice_caller_id_lookup}, #{sms_url}, #{sms_method}, #{sms_fallback_url}, #{sms_fallback_method}, #{url});
